description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText:
::The red tube is shaking violently.::

Why? After all you've done - *this*!

ABOMINATION-- nnnnn--

::You peek through the glass. The fluids inside the tank-machine are moving slowly and in a swirling motion.

Something else is moving in there...::

::The red tube shakes and hisses.::

The utility section-- hhhnnn, below. Way *below*.

Generator - turn it on, and stay inside the cage until... until the *flashing* stops.
::As you look inside, you find him already looking back. The red tube is vibrating softly.::

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText: ::Give him the soft gray and purple suit.::

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText:
And I'll regain control... and let him in.

Aaaaaahhh... ::Several tubes shake, relaxing him and clearing up his fluids a bit, yet still not enough for them to be fully clear.::

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText:
ABOMINATION-- nnnnnnnn-- 

::The red tube starts shaking violently.:: You ruined--

...*ruined* us! I've seen you!
I've watched you over the cameras. I don't know where Kirill found you, but you-- nnnnn... did well.

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText:
::He leans forward with great effort.::

It's... difficult without the chems.

::The red tube shakes, but the sound is hollow.::

All out. It's difficult... without it.

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText:
No... That one's Kirill's.

...the other suit... is mine. Gray... and purple.

That's the one...

...I wore it until... *this* happened.
::Reach for the red tube and pull it out.::

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText: Can you even understand what I'm saying?

::The red tube shakes and hisses.::

I must go; being fully awake is painful--

...for me. I'm sure *you* understand.

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText: ::The fluid is too murky. You can only see a man-shaped silhouette.::

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText:
Hnnnnnnn...

The pocket... right side... ::He points through the glass. His finger is crooked.::

::The red tube is still shaking.::

You-- cannnnn't-- can't hurt me-- in here...

::You rip the tube out with ease from both ends of the tank-machine.::

You want-- hhhh-- me now-- Nnnnnnnn--
::Now the purple tube starts shaking, softly and occassionally, and he calms down.::

::flinches a few times, sinking forward just enough for you to make out his face: It's twitching fitfully, and he's mouthing something you can't even hear. 

Doesn't seem intended for you anyway.::

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText:
::The purple tube vibrates softly.::

Besides... it's time... fix the security glitch... they exploited.

...this mess...

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText: Rip them all out. You've... you've killed me before you even touched it.
::A purple tube to the left hisses and shakes, lulling him back into the thick fluids.::

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText:
::The red tube to the left shakes and hisses.::

Nnnnnkkkkh... aaa...

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText:
Heh, nnnnn-- ::The purple tube hisses.:: Aaahhh... 

A mutant with a sense of humor.

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText:
::The red tube shakes violently - and so does your head...

...it hurts...::
Wrong... The other one, the other one.

There... *right*. *Right*.

...you understood this much so far, you.

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText:
::You stare at each other for a while. He sways back to front, sometimes left to right.::

Do you... do you even know what you did?

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText:
An escaped subje-- 

::The purple tube hisses, and he relaxes.::

It's you.

An escaped subject! How'd you get in--...? Hhhhh...

::The purple tube hisses, and he relaxes.::

Begone, creature. I'm not... I'm not wasting my chems on *you*.

Doesn't matter anyway... 

It's not your fault. In a way... 

...it's Kirill's and Anton's fault... 

...and mine too... in one small part.
::He eyes you intently, and the red tube starts to vibrate softly.::

::You're not speaking with your voice - you're not speaking at all.

It's the voice in your mind. It's... calling him.::

::You find a small metal round thing.::

Yes, that's it. Put it here.

::A small panel opens near the tubes with a hiss.::

The suit... I don't need no more.

::You hear a rumbling sound coming from the end of the hallway.::

Listen... if you still have a shred of humanity in you... and by now I know you can understand me... Bring me my old suit.

It's in... the vault. The vault.

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText:
::The red tube stops hissing, cueing you to open your eyes. It is still vibrating softly.::

Hhhhhhhhnnnn... I hear it... I hear him.
::The round thing has a line in the middle. Maybe you could open it.::

Hurry up...

::The purple tube hisses.::

If you want to get out of here...

::His eye turns to you, growing slightly bigger.:: 

You! Can you underst-- understand me?
::You put the thing inside a small chamber, and the panel closes. A few moments later, you hear fluids filling it up.::

You don't... don't know how to open that.

Just... give it to me.

::The thing breaks apart in your claw. Metal bits fall to the ground, and among them you see colorful shapes of strange objects, appearing and moving so lifelike until the shiny material disintegrates.::

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText:
::You peek through the glass and see that he has opened it, and it casts a faint but colorful glow on his face.

He is focused on it, but you can't see anything clearly or even understand its significance.::

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText: Focus, mutant! ::The purple tube vibrates, and he calms down a bit.::

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText: ::He then leans back as the purple tube hisses softly.::

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText: ::He just leans back as the purple tube hisses softly.::
He wouldn't have se-hhhhnnnn, sent you to me if you were a braindead reject. Hhhhnnnn...

::A big tube in the back shakes, making a slurping sound. The fluids clear up a bit.::

We haven't... much time... I'm on backup p-power, and my chems are, are low, hnnnnn.

Turn on the generator. The *ge-ne-ra-tor*! Do you understand me, mutant? Do you under--stand me?

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText:
::The purple tube hisses again, and you see relief on the man's face.::

Look to the screen... next to me, look... It'll show you what...

...to do.
::The tubes stop moving, and no sounds are heard from the tank-machine except for a faint hum.::

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも

originalText: ::The screens light up, and each one shows a screen-machine with a blue glow - four of them in total. They look like the ones in the corner of this room.::
::Then the images change, showing each one of these screen-machines turning on, one by one, screen by screen.::

::Then all the screens change to show one big image - of a large room. The blue screen-machines are in it, and in the middle there is a green one, different then the rest and somehow looking more significant. 

Then it turns on too, and the image flashes white - then fades to black.::

::Tank-machine becomes noisy again, and the red tube shakes and hisses.::

Go to the utility section below-- hhhhh... Turn the generator on... and stay inside the cage until... until the *flashing* stops.
